org.apfloat.spi

Interface AdditionBuilder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The element type of the addition strategies.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleAdditionBuilder, FloatAdditionBuilder, IntAdditionBuilder, LongAdditionBuilder

    public interface AdditionBuilder<T>
    Interface of a factory for creating addition strategies. The factory method pattern is used.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Version:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Mikko Tommila
    See Also:
    AdditionStrategy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdditionStrategy<T> createAddition(int radix)
      Returns an addition strategy of suitable type for the specified radix.

    • Method Detail

      • createAddition

        AdditionStrategy<T> createAddition(int radix)
        Returns an addition strategy of suitable type for the specified radix.
        Parameters:
        radix - The radix that will be used.
        Returns:
        A suitable object for performing the addition.
